name: Vision Runner
description: Vision Runner is a First Person Parkour game with an In-Game map editor. Build and Share your parkours or play parkours from other players.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: Quad-Core Intel or AMD, 2.3GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8.1/10 64bit Processor: Quad-Core Intel or AMD, 2.5GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290X series card or higher DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 2 GB available space
